enhanced_grid.PrincipleContainer

enhanced_grid.PrincipleContainer Class Reference

Sub-classes of this container can be used directly. More...

Inheritance diagram for enhanced_grid.PrincipleContainer:

[legend]

Detailed Description

Sub-classes of this container can be used directly.

A principle container will do assignment on a 1D point. Assignment of larger chunks is delegated to the AuxilaryContainer with the right dimensions.

The enherritance is merely for documentation purposes.
